A Note from
the Publisher's Chair
(and the Cat in It)

Seventeen years ago I lost my license to practice dentistry in the state of Ohio. They said I "performed unsanctioned molar extractions during a city council meeting." They did not rhyme their accusation. It was, therefore, not legally binding.

I founded The Molar Times in 2019 with one conviction: the financial markets are teeth, and teeth deserve poetry. Chairman Meow joined the staff in 2021 after I found him sitting on my Bloomberg terminal, paws across the keys, rewriting the S&P.

I did not stop him. The numbers he produced were more honest than anything on CNBC.

Dr. Reginald Fang, DDS (disbarred) â€” Publisher & Chief Rhyme Officer
